dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach technical problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on trial and error to find solutions, often repeating the same steps multiple times.
Your FarTwin will approach problems analytically, breaking them down into smaller components and evaluating options systematically.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle risk in financial decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will avoid taking significant risks, prioritizing stability and security over potential gains.
Your FarTwin will actively seek out high-risk opportunities, willing to potentially lose everything in pursuit of large rewards.

dimensions.label: Work Ethic
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin balance work and leisure time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be extremely driven, often putting in long hours to achieve goals and maintain a high level of productivity.
Your FarTwin will prioritize enjoying life outside of work, seeking balance between productivity and personal time.

dimensions.label: Open-Mindedness
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new ideas and perspectives?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be open to exploring new concepts and opinions, actively seeking out diverse viewpoints.
Your FarTwin will be skeptical of new ideas, often clinging to established beliefs and perspectives.

dimensions.label: Ambition Level
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin pursue long-term goals?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be extremely focused on achieving their objectives, willing to put in the necessary effort and sacrifice.
Your FarTwin will have a strong desire for success, but may take a more relaxed approach to achieving their goals.

dimensions.label: Humor Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle difficult situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will attempt to diffuse tense situations with humor, using wit and levity to ease the way.
Your FarTwin will approach challenges with a more somber demeanor, prioritizing seriousness and gravitas over levity.

dimensions.label: Social Connections
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin build relationships?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly social, actively seeking out new connections and friendships to expand their network.
Your FarTwin will prefer smaller, more intimate groups, focusing on deepening existing relationships rather than seeking new ones.

dimensions.label: Technological Comfort
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly proficient in using technology, seamlessly integrating it into their daily life and work.
Your FarTwin will have a basic level of comfort with technology, but may not be as familiar or adept at using it to its full potential.
